body.p: Simal consists of a number of modules. This document describes how to get each module in the various formats available.

section.title: Simal Core
section.p: Simal core is the main repository and command line application. More information is available in the Simal overview.
At present Simal Core is only available in source format. There will be a binary release in the near future.

ul.li: Simal Core uses Maven to manage its dependencies. This means that you only need to ensure your system has the following items installed, everything else will be downloaded automatically.

section.title: Getting the Source
section.p: The source code of Simal Core is available from our Subversion repository .

section.title: Now What?
section.p: Now you have downloaded the source you probably want to build it. This is documented on our Developing Simal Core .

section.title: Simal REST Module
section.p: The Simal REST module is a REST application for working with a Simal repository. More information is available in the Simal overview.
At present Simal REST module is only available in source format. There will be a binary release in the near future.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: Simal REST is dependant on Simal Core (see above) which must be installed in your local maven repository. Follow the instructions above and then run mvn install from within the Simal Core directory.

section.title: Getting the Source
section.p: The source code of Simal REST is available from our Subversion repository .
